transcript:
#Person1#: Ms. Dawson, I need you to, uh, take a dictation for me.
#Person2#: Yes, sir...
#Person1#: This should go out as an intra-office memorandum to all employees by, you know, this afternoon. Are you ready?
#Person2#: Yes, sir. Go ahead.
#Person1#: Okay, so... Attention all staff... Effective immediately, all office communications are restricted to email correspondence and official memos.
#Person2#: Uh-huh
#Person1#: The use of Instant Message programs by employees during working hours is, well, strictly prohibited.
#Person2#: Sir, does this apply to, just, intra-office communications only? Or will it also restrict external communications?
#Person1#: It should apply to all communications, not only in this office between employees, but also any outside communications, if you know what I mean.
#Person2#: I see
#Person2#: But sir, many employees use Instant Messaging to communicate with their clients, right?
#Person1#: They will just have to, uh, change their communication methods.
#Person2#: Okay
#Person1#: I don't want anyone using Instant Messaging in this office. It wastes too much time, you know? Now, please continue with the memo. Where were we?
#Person2#: This applies to internal and external communications, right?
#Person1#: Yes, that's right. Any employee who persists in using Instant Messaging will first receive a warning and be placed on probation.
#Person2#: Got it
#Person1#: At second offense, the employee will face termination. Any questions regarding this new policy may be directed to department heads, okay?
#Person2#: Is that all?
#Person1#: Yes, I think so. Please get this memo typed up and distributed to all employees before, you know, 4 pm.
#Person2#: Alright, sir.
#Person1#: Thanks, Ms. Dawson.
emotion_summary: Person1 expresses authority and control, while Person2 shows compliance and curiosity.
paralinguistic_info: Person1: male, middle-aged adult; Person2: female, middle-aged adult
generated_summary: Ms. Dawson helps #Person1# to write a memo to inform every employee that they have to change the communication method and should not use Instant Messaging anymore.
A cheerful birthday exchange between two people.
